text: The Kia KX3 is a subcompact Crossover SUV made by Kia through the Yueda-Kia joint venture from 2015 to 2023. == First Generation (2015-2019) == The Kia KX3 was shown for the first time as a concept at The Guangzhou Auto Show in 2014 and was shown as a production model in 2015. The car shares its plataform with the Hyundai ix25 and has a 1.6 liter 1.6 liter turbo and 2.0 liter petrol engines with a 6-speed both manual and automatic transmissions and a 7-speed DCT transmission. The car was then improved in 2016. The car had a electric version called Kia KX3 EV launched in 2018. It has 81 kW (109 hp) and a consumption of 100 km. == Second Generation (2019-present) == The second generation of the Kia KX3 was shown in September 2019. It is actually the Kia Seltos under the name KX3. The second gen has a additional Chinese name called Aopao. It was put on sale in China in December. It has a 1.5 liter petrol engine with a CVT transmission. == Markets == The Kia KX3 was sold only in The Chinese Market during its entire production. == Discontinuation == The production of The Kia KX3 ended in 2023. It was then renamed back to Kia Seltos. == References == KX3 Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Kia KX3
